reviews.review:
Holy shit I have never seen such an amazing sequel to the 1st game as hl2. Half life 2 is just game-breaking in every way including the fact that it uses the Source engine which for it's time and even now is such a perfect engine to combine with this game. From the way you pickup and throw things are way more improved in this sequel that came out shortly after the 1st. You gotta play it especially for the new enemy race called the combine who want to destroy humanity by slaving it for their uses but only one person can save the day and it's the one and only man from Black Mesa, Gordon Freeman!

Seriously if you want to begin with this series I heavily recommend the fan remake called Black Mesa over Half Life 1/ Source as it will help you understand what is going on in the 2nd game.

Normalde hikayeli oyunları soluksuz oynayabilen biri değilim. Ama bu şaheseri oynarken zamanın nasıl geçtiğini anlamadım. Birbirinden zevkli oyun mekanikleri, olay örgüsü ve mekan tasarımları can alıcıydı. Bölüm tasarımları oyunun beni en fazla cezbeden noktasıydı. Bu zamana kadar oynamamış olmaktan pişman olabilirim ama bu oyunu oynamış olmaktan gayet memnunum.

Was soll man sagen. Es wird nicht zu unrecht unter den besten Spielen aller Zeiten aufgelistet. Meiner Meinung nach einfach ein muss, die Atmosphäre, die Story, das Gameplay der Soundtrack, hier stimmt alles. Sieht für ein mittlerweile 17 Jahre altes Spiel auch noch extrem gut aus.

Las historias de Gordo Hombre Libre siguen en este juego que es el mejor juego de Valve y los mejores del mundo. Aunque hay algunas cosas que me decepcionaron como el final abierto que no sigue en un Half life 3. Este muy buen juego es lo que Gabe inicio y debe terminar. Masterpiece 10/10

This game is on the very small list of games everybody should own. It doesn't really matter what kind of games you are into, you will still have a great time. Make sure to play Half-Life 1 first

A great game that just gets better as it goes on! 

The character animations and NPCs seem very advanced for its time, and that can also be said about the level designs. These levels are so creative and feel very grand in scale, making for some thrilling gameplay. The variety of weapons and use of the gravity gun allows the player to approach encounters in very creative ways. 

I would often just try out random stuff that actually would work in getting me from point A to point B. What makes it great is that the game didn't tell me to do any of it; I CHOSE to do it. The game in no way holds your hand and tells you what to do, which is something I greatly appreciate about it. It grants the player as much freedom as it can while still pointing you in the right direction to continue the story.

The narrative collides with the gameplay as well as it can while still keeping the player engaged in what's going on. It also helps that the voice acting and characters were extremely well done. The vast amount of enemies were also very refreshing. You're not always just fighting the same goons over and over again; there's genuine variety in every single aspect of this game.

It's no surprise to me that this is as acclaimed as it is! Half-Life 2 is amazingly fun and creative from both a gameplay and world building perspective, and I would definitely recommend anyone who likes games at all to experience it. It's truly groundbreaking for its time and paved the way for the future of video gaming.

Half-Life 1 - это легендарная игра в своём жанре, но поиграв в Half-Life 2, ты меняешь свой взгляд на игры...
Я люблю игры Валв, я поистине проникся Portal и Portal 2. Но пройдя даже в Портал 2, я не так ей проникся, как Халвой... Half-Life 2 - самая сюжетно глубокая игра, которую я пока видел. Это неописуемый сюжет, который заставляет вас переживать за судьбу Гордона Фримена и Аликс, помогать повстанцам и убивать Комбайнов и Метрокопов Сити-17. Претензия лишь одна: концовка незаконченная, но на то и есть эпизоды. Half-Life 2 является игрой, не поиграв в которую, ты не имеешь права считать себя геймером. 10/10!
